channel.title: Fluent NHibernate on I Prefer Jim
channel.description: Recent content in Fluent NHibernate on I Prefer Jim

item.title: NHibernate.Criterion Extensions workaround
item.description: I’ve been working with Fluent NHibernate for the past month or so, and I realized while writing an NHibernate query that the NHibernate Criterion’s Restrictions class isn’t very refactor-friendly.

item.title: Fluent NHibernate error: Unable to cast object of type ‘Oracle.DataAccess.Client.OracleConnection’ to type ‘System.Data.Common.DbConnection’.
item.description: After developing an application in Fluent NHibernate, I’ve received the following Error and Stack Trace: Unable to cast object of type 'Oracle.

item.title: ArgumentOutOfRangeException : Index was out of range. Fluent NHibernate commit
item.description: I came across the error ArgumentOutOfRangeException : Index was out of range while trying to perform a commit on a single entity with 4 nested entities and 3 properties.

item.title: log4net configuration in .NET 3.5
item.description: Step 1 Add Reference Right click on the “References” folder and choose add reference. Browse to the location of log4net and add it to the project.
